MainAll news.
MainAll news.
Thursday in Carelia: trial of teachers and widow ' s assistance
In the Prionez region, a soldier died in the SVR area, in the capital of the republic, the teachers were sent to a colony, and the widow of the Petrosavian asked for help, as was said on this Thursday.
Yesterday, 17:43
Functioned with financial support from the Ministry of Digital
communications and mass communications Russian Federation
Russian-owned housing is widely sold in Finland
Russia ' s citizens sell their assets in Finland - houses, apartments and other real estate facilities.
14 February, 16:21
The slope that prevented the movement of trolleybuses in Petrozavodsk was removed from the way
More than a day, the movement of public transport was hampered by the use of public transport, as indicated in the GCO.
14 February, 14:44
Is the story over? As pets, they were disappointed in hyperborei
Last week, Petrozavodsk hosted another ice and snow sculpture festival, often called the winter day of the city. However, many of the Gorans decided to miss the holiday. We tried to find out why a popular city event once stopped attracting Petrosavans.
14 February, 14:21
To repair the Petrozavodska road will send half a billion roubles
Major sums will be allocated to road safety activities of the Karel capital, as reported by Petrosovet
14 February, 12:20
Synoptics told me how long anomalies would last in Carelia.
Russia will cover negative temperatures below normal. This is being warned at the Russian Hydrometeorological Centre.
14 February, 11:11

Petrozavodska's latest news today

Border Karelia protects historical memory
Forum on " Reach for Historical Memory " . Scientists against Nazism went to Petrgu. There were reports on the atrocities of the gangsters, the correspondence of history to the collective West and the rise of neo-Nazism.
Today, 06:59
The students of Karelia spoke about the profession of a diplomat.
In the Karel branch of Pvuz, a meeting was held with the students and teachers of Andrei Kudravtsev, Counsellor of the Mission of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Russia in Petrozavodsk. The event was held in conjunction with the professional holiday of Russian diplomats, the Day of Diplomacy.
Today, 06:56
Carel synoptics: current winter in the Republic
The region has experienced several periods of heavy freezes and heavy snowing. From November until today, 215 mm rainfall in the Republic fell. This is the absolute maximum since 1966. The height of the snow cover in Petrozavodsk is now 62 cm.
Today, 06:38
There's been a terrible footage from the scene of the carelia accident, where a little kid died.
Three people were killed in the accident, including an annual baby, and the network was stunning from the scene.
Today, 05:45
Remedial the effects of snowfalls in Carelia will require time
In the republic ' s areas, intensive work on the removal of snow from roads is continuing, and is reported to the Carlattotrans CDU.
Today, 5:00.
After three deaths in Carelia, criminal proceedings were initiated
The Chief of the Fur is in danger of being detained: this has been reported to the Public Prosecutor ' s Office.
Today, 04:39
